Alolan Marowak.desc: The bones it possesses were once its mother’s. Its mother’s regrets have become like a vengeful spirit protecting this Pokémon.
Its custom is to mourn its lost companions. Mounds of dirt by the side of the road mark the graves of the Marowak.
The rich greenery of the Alola region is hard on Marowak. It controls fire to stay alive.
When it beats opponents with its bone, the cursed flames spread to them. No amount of water will stop those flames from burning.
It has transformed the spirit of its dear departed mother into flames, and tonight it will once again dance in mourning of others of its kind.
This Pokémon sets the bone it holds on fire and dances through the night as a way to mourn its fallen allies.
The cursed flames that light up the bone carried by this Pokémon are said to cause both mental and physical pain that will never fade.
